evidence: Repository contains multiple standalone Python scripts (doubles.py, doubles_all.py, etc.) with no clear package structure
Each script appears to be self-contained with its own imports and functions
Presence of build scripts and extensions (pyext-myclib, pyext-myrustlib) suggests script-level integration rather than architectural organization
Maximum directory depth is only 2, indicating flat structure
No evidence of layered organization, MVC patterns, or service decomposition
Average fan-out of 5.0 suggests loose coupling between scripts and modules
Low maintainability index (67.86 average) consistent with script-based development
risks: Low code maintainability may become problematic as scripts grow
Lack of architectural structure may hinder long-term project scalability
Tight coupling between scripts and external libraries (numpy, rust extensions)
